item.title: Trump and Putin teased ‘enormous economic deals’ in their call—but U.S. companies will experience a very different Russia if they return
item.description: Russia has a new business elite and radically altered marketplace—and it’s done away with key legal protections.

item.title: Trump’s trade war could claim a new victim: Canada and Europe are reconsidering $150 million Lockheed Martin fighter jets
item.description: Canada and Europe are questioning whether big-ticket purchases of high-end U.S. weaponry are still a wise strategic choice.

item.title: Eric Migicovsky says Apple makes it ‘nearly impossible’ for developers to create an experience that rivals the Apple Watch, adding claims about security are ‘what they tell you as they tuck you into bed’
item.description: "They’re clearly using their market power to lock consumers into their walled ecosystem," he added.

item.title: Elon Musk says he and DOGE found 14 ‘magic money computers’ that create money out of thin air
item.description: "If it was a public company, it would be delisted immediately," Musk said of the government.

item.title: Millennials choosing to be DINKs could push GDP down by as much as 4%
item.description: "By the time you get to 2030, you're talking about a birth rate that is wildly different to what was in the assumptions made at the beginning of the d...
